devdoc.author: Silentnoname
devdoc.details: This contract can be implemented as a upgradeable contract

createpayment(string,uint256,string[]).details: Store payment in payments[counter].Payment id will be same as the counter. Payment id will be pushed into paymentsbook[msg.sender]. counter +1

params._name: Name of the payment as the people who create the payment want
params._payer_list: The list of the payer name

fetch_payment(uint256).details: Get the payment detail by payments[_id]

fetch_paymentsbook(address).details: Get the array of payments' id by paymentsbook[_receiver_address]

returns.payments_book: Array of payments' id created by given address

initialize().details: the initial owner is msg.sender,paused is false

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pay(uint256,string).details: payments[_id].received_am and payments[_id].balance both +payments[_id].price. Push _payer in payments[_id].paid_payer_list.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._withdraw_amount: The amount payment receiver want to withdraw

counter.details: An increment interger for recording payment id

payments.details: A map from id to payment

paymentsbook.details: A map from address to id array

devdoc.title: Create Payment on chain

cancelpayment(uint256).notice: Cancel the payment by payment id(only payment receiver can cancel this payment,finised payment cannot be canceled)

createpayment(string,uint256,string[]).notice: Create a payment by name,total amount,payer list.The payment receiver will be the man who create this payment.

fetch_payment(uint256).notice: Get the payment detail by payment ID

fetch_paymentsbook(address).notice: Get the payments created by given address

initialize().notice: Initialize the owner and pause situation

pay(uint256,string).notice: Pay the payment by payment id and payer name,should pay enough money and give right payer name.One payer can only pay once,extra money will be refunded.(canceled payment cannot pay)

withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw the balance of payment by payment id and withdraw amount (only payment receiver can withdraw this payment's balance)

userdoc.notice: This is an experimental contract，please use at your own risk. Anyone can use this contract to create payment,pay payment
